00021 #include "OgreOggStaticSound.h"
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include "OgreOggSoundManager.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 namespace OgreOggSound
00029 {

00031         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00032         OgreOggStaticSound::OgreOggStaticSound(const Ogre::String& name) : OgreOggISound(name)
00033         {
00034                 mStream=false;
00035                 mOggFile=0;                                             
00036                 mVorbisInfo=0;                  
00037                 mVorbisComment=0;               
00038                 mBufferData.clear();    
00039                 mPreviousOffset=0;
00040                 mBuffer=0;                                              
00041         }
00042         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00043         OgreOggStaticSound::~OgreOggStaticSound()
00044         {
00045                 _release();
00046                 mOggFile=0;                                             
00047                 mVorbisInfo=0;                  
00048                 mVorbisComment=0;               
00049                 mBufferData.clear();            
00050         }
00051         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00052         void OgreOggStaticSound::open(Ogre::DataStreamPtr& fileStream)
00053         {
00054                 int result;
00055 
00056                 mOgreOggStream = fileStream;
00057 
00058                 if((result = ov_open_callbacks(&mOgreOggStream, &mOggStream, NULL, 0, mOggCallbacks)) < 0)
00059                 {
00060                         throw string("Could not open Ogg stream. ");
00061                         return;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 mVorbisInfo = ov_info(&mOggStream, -1);
00065                 mVorbisComment = ov_comment(&mOggStream, -1);
00066 
00067                 if(mVorbisInfo->channels == 1)
00068                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00069                 else
00070                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;   
00071 
00072                 alGenBuffers(1, &mBuffer);
00073 
00074                 char data[BUFFER_SIZE];
00075                 int sizeRead = 0;
00076                 int bitStream;
00077                 do
00078                 {
00079                         sizeRead = ov_read(&mOggStream, data, BUFFER_SIZE, 0, 2, 1, &bitStream);
00080                         mBufferData.insert(mBufferData.end(), data, data + sizeRead);
00081                 } 
00082                 while(sizeRead > 0);
00083 
00084                 // Upload to XRAM buffers if available
00085                 if ( OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().hasXRamSupport() )
00086                         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().setXRamBuffer(1, &mBuffer);
00087 
00088                 alGetError();
00089                 alBufferData(mBuffer, mFormat, &mBufferData[0], static_cast < ALsizei > (mBufferData.size()), mVorbisInfo->rate);
00090                 if ( alGetError()!=AL_NO_ERROR )
00091                 {
00092                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticSound::open() - Unable to load audio data into buffer!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00093                         throw std::string("Unable to load buffers with data!");
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00097         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00098         void OgreOggStaticSound::_release()
00099         {
00100                 ALuint src=AL_NONE;
00101                 setSource(src);
00102                 alDeleteBuffers(1,&mBuffer);
00103                 ov_clear(&mOggStream);
00104         }
00105         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00106         void OgreOggStaticSound::_prebuffer()
00107         {
00108                 if (mSource==AL_NONE) return;
00109 
00110                 // Queue buffer
00111                 alSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFER, mBuffer);
00112         }
00113 
00114         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00115         void OgreOggStaticSound::setSource(ALuint& src)
00116         {
00117                 if (src!=AL_NONE)
00118                 {
00119                         // Attach new source
00120                         mSource=src;
00121                         
00122                         // Load audio data onto source
00123                         _prebuffer();
00124 
00125                         // Init source properties
00126                         _initSource();
00127                 }
00128                 else
00129                 {
00130                         // Need to stop sound BEFORE unqueuing
00131                         alSourceStop(mSource);
00132 
00133                         // Unqueue buffer
00134                         alSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFER, 0);
00135 
00136                         // Attach new source
00137                         mSource=src;
00138                 }
00139         }
00140         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00141         void OgreOggStaticSound::pause()
00142         {               
00143                 if ( mSource!=AL_NONE ) return;
00144 
00145                 alSourcePause(mSource);
00146         }
00147         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00148         void OgreOggStaticSound::play()
00149         {       
00150                 if(isPlaying())
00151                         return;
00152 
00153                 if (mSource == AL_NONE)
00154                         if ( !OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().requestSoundSource(this) )
00155                                 return;
00156 
00157                 alSourcePlay(mSource);  
00158                 mPlay=true;
00159         }
00160         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00161         void OgreOggStaticSound::stop()
00162         {
00163                 if ( mSource==AL_NONE ) return;
00164 
00165                 alSourceStop(mSource);
00166                 alSourceRewind(mSource);        
00167                 mPlay=false;
00168                 mPreviousOffset=0;
00169 
00170                 // Give up source immediately if specfied
00171                 if (mGiveUpSource) OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().releaseSoundSource(this);
00172         }
00173         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00174         void OgreOggStaticSound::loop(bool loop)
00175         {
00176                 OgreOggISound::loop(loop);
00177 
00178                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00179                 {
00180                         alSourcei(mSource,AL_LOOPING, loop);
00181                 }
00182         }       
00183         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00184         void OgreOggStaticSound::_updateAudioBuffers()
00185         {
00186                 if(mSource == AL_NONE || !mPlay)
00187                         return;
00188 
00189                 ALenum state;    
00190                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state); 
00191 
00192                 if (state == AL_STOPPED)
00193                 {
00194                         stop();
00195                         // Finished callback
00196                         if ( mFinishedCB && mFinCBEnabled ) 
00197                                 mFinishedCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00198                 }
00199                 else
00200                 {
00201                         ALint bytes=0;
00202 
00203                         // Use byte offset to work out current position
00204                         alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BYTE_OFFSET, &bytes);
00205                         
00206                         // Has the audio looped?
00207                         if ( mPreviousOffset>bytes )
00208                         {
00209                                 if ( mLoopCB && mLoopCBEnabled )
00210                                         mLoopCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00211                         }
00212 
00213                         // Store current offset position                        
00214                         mPreviousOffset=bytes;
00215                 }
00216         }
00217 }
